attributes.action: Prevent the sale of personal information by the DVLA to private companies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The DVLA currently charge £2.50 for the personal details of people to private companies, unlike most companies there is no option to opt out of this situation on the V5 in contradiction with the data protection act. We the undersigned wish for this to be rectified.
